message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd love to see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $12,800, but I think that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
